text: Lepisanthes unilocularis was a species of plant in the family Sapindaceae. It was endemic to China. It is extinct in nature, having last been seen in 1935. ==References== unilocularis Category:Endemic flora of China Category:Extinct plants Category:Extinct biota of Asia Category:Flora of Hainan Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Lepisanthes unilocularis
